name: CNN
text: "Typically, It can be difficult to trace an outcome back to the exact policy or action. During the pandemic, however, the link between federal inaction and widespread mortality is more direct and immediate than ever before" | Fiana Garza Tulip, @CNNOpinion https://t.co/pv8ESmybw7

name: CNN
text: Republican Sen. Tom Cotton described slavery as a "necessary evil" in his ongoing effort to prevent US schools from teaching the 1619 Project, an initiative from the NYT that reframes US history around when the first slave ship arrived on America's shores https://t.co/qdMVfoaZAf

name: CNN
text: "Nadler and the Judiciary Committee have plenty of work to do. ... Tuesday's hearing could mark the last time in [Barr's] tenure that he faces meaningful questioning in anything other than his own hand-picked forum," @eliehonig writes for @CNNOpinion https://t.co/d2sJRKXkn1

name: CNN
text:
In the run-up to the 2014 midterm elections, Republican David Perdue excoriated President Barack Obama over his handling of the Ebola outbreak.

Six years later, Perdue has praised President Trump, even as Trump has repeatedly downplayed the coronavirus. https://t.co/fbDBlGOKsT

name: CNN
text:

• Fewer opportunities to meet with colleagues
